price: Maze (Yusufu) amaze kuba igikwerere, tumuha ubushishozi n'ubumenyi (ubuhanuzi); uko ni ko duhemba abakora ibyiza.
arabic: وَلَمَّا بَلَغَ أَشُدَّهُۥٓ ءَاتَيۡنَٰهُ حُكۡمٗا وَعِلۡمٗاۚ وَكَذَٰلِكَ نَجۡزِي ٱلۡمُحۡسِنِينَ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: walammā balagha ashuddahu ātaynāhu ḥuk'man waʿil'man wakadhālika najzī al-muḥ'sinīna
